Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Soapy \Soap"y\, a. [Compar. {Soapier}; superl. {Soapiest}.] 1. Resembling soap; having the qualities of, or feeling like, soap; soft and smooth. [1913 Webster]
2. Smeared with soap; covered with soap. [1913 Webster]
soapy adj : having the qualities of soap (and liable to slip away) [syn: {saponaceous}] [also: {soapiest}, {soapier}]
